participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Charming and sociable, Oliver has a knack for engaging with people and enjoys the company of pets. He has a creative side but prefers culinary arts over crafts.
participant_1.background: I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert. My mom is a nurse. I love to crochet. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries. I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is quirky and fun-loving, with a penchant for creativity and a dash of clumsiness. She embraces new experiences and shows passion for her hobbies.
participant_2.background: I rent an apartment to have more space for my sewing machine and gaming consoles. I am going to start school at the University of Kentucky. I am currently single. My dog loves spaghetti and meatballs as much as I do. I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

content.text: Hey! I'm a dog walker, it's a great way to meet new people and their pets.
Hi! I rent an apartment so I can have more space for my sewing machine and gaming consoles.
That's cool! I love to sew, what do you like to make?
I make a lot of clothes and home decor items. I also make dog sweaters for my pup.
That's awesome! I'm not very crafty but I can cook. I'm into designer French fries.
I love spaghetti and meatballs! I'm not the best cook but I make a mean pot of spaghetti sauce.
That sounds delicious! I'm going to have to try making that soon.
You should! It's easy and it's a great comfort food.
I'm curious, what are you going to study at UK?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business or communications.
Those are both great options! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be a lot of fun.
